passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > section:nth-child(6) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(25) > div:nth-child(3) > section > header:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(26) > footer:nth-child(3) > section > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(26) > footer:nth-child(3) > section > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(3) > h2:nth-child(1)

html > body > div:nth-child(26) > footer:nth-child(3) > section > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(7) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(26) > footer:nth-child(3) > section > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(9) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(70) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > iframe:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(70) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > iframe:nth-child(2)
